pageContext.claim: “Many people have died. Many, many people. Many people are so horribly injured. I was at Walter Reed Hospital recently and I saw so many great young people and their missing legs and their missing arms and they've been so badly injured. And they were fighting for our country. They were fighting for our flag. They were fighting for our national anthem. And for people to disrespect that by kneeling during the playing of our national anthem I think is disgraceful.”
pageContext.analysis: NFL players who decided to kneel during the anthem prior to the game said it was an act of protest against police brutality of black Americans.
